Summary: white glowing more rounded version of an american B2 Bomber
divs: sighting detailsit was late and i was standing outside in my backyard smoking a cigarette, during this time my friends were coming over. i was staring at the stars because it was such a clear night. when i was looking up i saw for a couple seconds a glowing flash with a shape of a ship. it was flying very fast, i've never seen anything fly that fast before. i was shocked and my eyes instantly started to get very watery. i also felt like i froze in motion. in a way i felt like i was having a psychedelic experience, i had an extreme feeling of awareness and a lonely feeling. my friends then came over and we talked about aliens and ufo's for about 3 hours. one of my friends had already seen 3 ufo's. we then realized their was a sighting in san bruno a couple weeks before. the video is on youtube. but it didn't look anything like the one i saw. i believe aliens will visit us and help us rejuvenate the earth, i don't believe they are here to harm us. *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg).
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Millbrae
There were no other sightings in Millbrae on or around February 3rd 2011
